author: Nick Nairn
method: In a pan heat together the red wine, sugar and star anise until gently simmering. Add the pear and poach for 5-10 minutes, turning occasionally, until tender. To serve, place the pear into a bowl with the cooking liquor and Greek yoghurt spooned alongside.
